data.title: About Tanya Cole
data.meta_description:
Tanya Cole~Soul Song Creating Artist, OT/Expressive Art & Wellness Facilitator. Join her Art Community at soulsongcreating.com * Invest/ collect/commission Original artworks at >>> tanyacolearts.com
	
	Tanya Cole is an Expressive Mixed Media Artist & OT based in Dunsborough, Western Australia. Her personal style as an Artist, extends from stylised whimsical portraits & drawings, mixed media paintings and vibrant and expressive canvas pieces, created in the intuitive style of painting. Whilst she naturally enjoys producing the details and shading of beautiful whimsical faces, she is greatly inspired and moved by the painterly movement of colour and texture on canvas. So a gentle dance ensues between the two styles as she is inspired.
	Original Artworks available at tancoleartist.com. However, you can also commission Tanya to create your very own original piece that 'speaks to you' and tells your story, life connections and experiences. Please email her at tdcole@bigpond.com to discuss your vision and investment.
	 
	Practicing as an OT under her business, Soul Song Creating, Tanya also facilitates Art & Wellness workshops and 1:1 sessions to assist people to gain personal insight, healing & self transformation. You are invited to pop over and join in on her art inspiration community at: soulsongcreating.com/
	
	"Intuitive painting is not just about painting, it is about opening yourself up to the creative being that lives inside you, exploring the well of wisdom and guidance that is in all of us but often shutdown and untapped. It is a portal into a deeper way of relating with the world and in expressing ourselves in a grounded and fuller way. It is about connecting with our soul and finding strength in this connection, joy, peace and contentment" Tanya Cole
data.text:
Tanya Cole~Soul Song Creating Artist, OT/Expressive Art & Wellness Facilitator. Join her Art Community at soulsongcreating.com * Invest/ collect/commission Original artworks at >>> tanyacolearts.com

Tanya Cole is an Expressive Mixed Media Artist & OT based in Dunsborough, Western Australia. Her personal style as an Artist, extends from stylised whimsical portraits & drawings, mixed media paintings and vibrant and expressive canvas pieces, created in the intuitive style of painting. Whilst she naturally enjoys producing the details and shading of beautiful whimsical faces, she is greatly inspired and moved by the painterly movement of colour and texture on canvas. So a gentle dance ensues between the two styles as she is inspired.

Original Artworks available at tancoleartist.com. However, you can also commission Tanya to create your very own original piece that 'speaks to you' and tells your story, life connections and experiences. Please email her at tdcole@bigpond.com to discuss your vision and investment.

Practicing as an OT under her business, Soul Song Creating, Tanya also facilitates Art & Wellness workshops and 1:1 sessions to assist people to gain personal insight, healing & self transformation. You are invited to pop over and join in on her art inspiration community at: soulsongcreating.com/

"Intuitive painting is not just about painting, it is about opening yourself up to the creative being that lives inside you, exploring the well of wisdom and guidance that is in all of us but often shutdown and untapped. It is a portal into a deeper way of relating with the world and in expressing ourselves in a grounded and fuller way. It is about connecting with our soul and finding strength in this connection, joy, peace and contentment" Tanya Cole
